description: 評估個體在五大人格特質上的表現，包含經驗開放性、嚴謹性、外向性、親和性與神經質五個維度。

dimensions.description: 焦慮、情緒不穩定、壓力反應

questions.textZh: 我喜歡嘗試新的食物和活動
questions.textEn: I like to try new foods and activities

questions.textZh: 我對藝術和美學有濃厚興趣
questions.textEn: I have a strong interest in art and aesthetics

questions.textZh: 我偏好熟悉的事物勝過新奇的體驗
questions.textEn: I prefer familiar things over novel experiences

questions.textZh: 我經常思考抽象的概念和理論
questions.textEn: I often think about abstract concepts and theories

questions.textZh: 我富有想像力
questions.textEn: I am imaginative

questions.textZh: 我不喜歡改變既定的計畫
questions.textEn: I don't like to change established plans

questions.textZh: 我對哲學和深層問題感興趣
questions.textEn: I am interested in philosophy and deep questions

questions.textZh: 我喜歡探索新的想法和觀點
questions.textEn: I like to explore new ideas and perspectives

questions.textZh: 我認為傳統方式通常最好
questions.textEn: I think traditional ways are usually best

questions.textZh: 我在社交場合中感到活力充沛
questions.textEn: I feel energized in social situations

questions.textZh: 我總是按時完成工作
questions.textEn: I always complete work on time

questions.textZh: 我經常忘記把東西放回原位
questions.textEn: I often forget to put things back in their place

questions.textZh: 我會仔細規劃我的行程
questions.textEn: I carefully plan my schedule

questions.textZh: 我在工作上很有條理
questions.textEn: I am organized in my work

questions.textZh: 我經常拖延重要的事情
questions.textEn: I often procrastinate on important things

questions.textZh: 我注重細節
questions.textEn: I pay attention to details

questions.textZh: 我的生活空間常常凌亂
questions.textEn: My living space is often messy

questions.textZh: 我會設定目標並努力達成
questions.textEn: I set goals and work hard to achieve them

questions.textZh: 我很少提前為事情做準備
questions.textEn: I rarely prepare in advance

questions.textZh: 我對自己的責任很認真
questions.textEn: I take my responsibilities seriously

questions.textZh: 我在聚會中感到精力充沛
questions.textEn: I feel energized at parties

questions.textZh: 我偏好獨處勝過與人相處
questions.textEn: I prefer being alone over being with people

questions.textZh: 我很容易與陌生人交談
questions.textEn: I easily talk to strangers

questions.textZh: 我喜歡成為關注的焦點
questions.textEn: I like being the center of attention

questions.textZh: 我在社交場合中感到不自在
questions.textEn: I feel uncomfortable in social situations

questions.textZh: 我有很多朋友
questions.textEn: I have many friends

questions.textZh: 我是一個安靜的人
questions.textEn: I am a quiet person

questions.textZh: 我喜歡參加熱鬧的活動
questions.textEn: I like to attend lively events

questions.textZh: 我不太主動開始對話
questions.textEn: I rarely initiate conversations

questions.textZh: 我充滿活力和熱情
questions.textEn: I am full of energy and enthusiasm

questions.textZh: 我關心他人的感受
questions.textEn: I care about others' feelings

questions.textZh: 我不太在乎別人的問題
questions.textEn: I don't care much about others' problems

questions.textZh: 我樂於幫助他人
questions.textEn: I am willing to help others

questions.textZh: 我信任大多數人
questions.textEn: I trust most people

questions.textZh: 我容易與人發生爭執
questions.textEn: I easily get into arguments with people

questions.textZh: 我對他人有同理心
questions.textEn: I have empathy for others

questions.textZh: 我認為人們基本上是自私的
questions.textEn: I think people are basically selfish

questions.textZh: 我善於合作
questions.textEn: I am good at cooperating

questions.textZh: 我有時對他人很粗魯
questions.textEn: I am sometimes rude to others

questions.textZh: 我喜歡讓別人感到舒適
questions.textEn: I like to make others feel comfortable

questions.textZh: 我經常感到焦慮
questions.textEn: I often feel anxious

questions.textZh: 我的心情很穩定
questions.textEn: My mood is very stable

questions.textZh: 我容易感到壓力
questions.textEn: I easily feel stressed

questions.textZh: 我經常擔心事情
questions.textEn: I often worry about things

questions.textZh: 我很少感到沮喪
questions.textEn: I rarely feel depressed

questions.textZh: 我的情緒起伏很大
questions.textEn: My emotions fluctuate greatly

questions.textZh: 我能夠保持冷靜
questions.textEn: I can stay calm

questions.textZh: 我容易被小事激怒
questions.textEn: I am easily annoyed by small things

questions.textZh: 我很少感到緊張
questions.textEn: I rarely feel nervous

questions.textZh: 我經常感到悲觀
questions.textEn: I often feel pessimistic
